title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text: This project is about the dynamic concepts of economics, to chart the course of global GDP growth rates from the years 1999 to 2022. Because of RStudio, it is possible to transform raw data into a narrative that reflects past economic trends, as well as help in forecasting future possibilities. The graph below is a visualizations which brings clarity to economics that may seem complex, making them accessible to anyone. The countries with the highest change in GDP over 23 years are China and the United States.

title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022

title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text:
Line Plot
The first plot below is a line plot. To read this, you focus on, obviously, the lines. Each line shows the GDP growth of a different country. We can even read specific point of the lines to determine a country’s GDP at a specified time.

title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text:
Bar Graphs
A bar graph consists of “boxes” that are designed to display the value of a country. Below are two bar graphs that show the values of five different countries at different points of time. An advantage of this is that it is easier to read than the line plot. However, a disadvantage compared to the line plot is that we can only see the values of one specific year at a time, rather than all the years in our dataset.

title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text:
Chloropleth
Our final graphic is a chloropleth. A chloropleth is a thematic map that displays data on a map. In the examples below, we can see a different color represents a different range of GDP values. Here, we can view all the countries, instead of just a few. The only disadvantage however, is that, similar to the bar graphs, we can only see the data for one specific year, and not all the years.









Here we see can see another Chloropleth map, but of the year 2022.

title: About
text:
My name is Kushal Kanuparthi, and I have always been amazed by the possibilities of computers, whether it’s through 3D Design, robotics, or even, coding.
My GitHub Profile: https://github.com/KushalK-dev
My email: kushal.kanuparthi@gmail.com
This project is about the change in GDP of major countries from the years 2000 to 2022, which is graphed onto a line plot.
This project was created as a part of Kane’s Data Science Bootcamp.

title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text:
Summary
Each of the graphics above have many advantages and disadvantages. There are different uses for each one, because they all display data in a different format than other kinds of plots.
